meta.description: High-level visual direction extracted from the provided landing/checkout screenshots. Use this as the creative brief to reproduce the look and feel across the app.
meta.tone: Warm, reassuring, family-friendly commerce with soft contrasts and generous breathing room.
meta.language_direction: rtl-first (Hebrew in captures); ensure all layouts support RTL and LTR.

page.alignment: centered column with card sections separated by whitespace

icons.style: Line icons with soft fills and rounded strokes; use simple pictograms for features (grid, heart, sparkles, shield).

navbar.style: Not shown; expect minimalist, no borders, aligned to center or right for RTL.

pricing_card.layout: horizontal price on right (RTL) with details left; badge overlay near top-left.
pricing_card.cta_state: Select via radio; full card highlights on selection with subtle shadow tint.

bundle_selector.cards: stacked vertically with consistent width and ample spacing

button_primary.hover: slightly darker gradient; lift with stronger shadow

items.alignment: row centered, star icon on right (RTL)

principles: Warm minimalism: lean layouts with soft colors and gentle shadows.
Hierarchy through weight, not size: few font sizes; rely on bold for emphasis.
Whitespace as a buffer: keep generous vertical spacing between sections and cards.
Rounded friendliness: pill buttons, rounded cards, circular radios.
Consistency in color temperature: stick to warm peaches/corals with muted browns for text.
Clarity for offers: show savings, old price, and free shipping in compact stacked lines.
Trust cues: payment brand strip anchored below CTAs, badges for recommendations.
Accessibility: maintain sufficient contrast for text on light backgrounds; ensure focus states on interactive elements.

usage_notes.rtl_support: Default flows are RTL; mirror spacing and alignment for LTR gracefully.
usage_notes.images: Not present in capture; rely on typography, iconography, and negative space.
usage_notes.animation: Keep subtle; micro-elevations on hover, gentle opacity fades for hover states.
